title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonics. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done at least isValidTypeName. The label could say 'Select destination type:'
OB: When browsing offers for a type from a CU in a different project, there is no validation on the type field and the label does not say 'Select destination type:'.
EB: When browsing offers for a type from a CU in a different project, the type field should be validated and the label should say 'Select destination type:'.
SR:
1. Open the project containing the CU.
2. Go to the 'Offers' section.
3. Try to browse offers for a type from a CU in a different project.
4. Observe the behavior of the type field and the label.
